scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: But, if there be, or ever were, one such,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: It's past the size of dreaming: nature wants stuff
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: To vie strange forms with fancy; yet, to imagine
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: And Antony, were nature's piece 'gainst fancy,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Condemning shadows quite.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Hear me, good madam.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Your loss is as yourself, great; and you bear it
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: As answering to the weight: would I might never
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: O'ertake pursued success, but I do feel,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: By the rebound of yours, a grief that smites
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: My very heart at root.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I thank you, sir,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Know you what Caesar means to do with me?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I am loath to tell you what I would you knew.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Nay, pray you, sir,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Though he be honourable,--
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: He'll lead me, then, in triumph?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Madam, he will; I know't.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Which is the Queen of Egypt?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: It is the emperor, madam.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Arise, you shall not kneel:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I pray you, rise; rise, Egypt.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Sir, the gods
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Will have it thus; my master and my lord
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I must obey.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Take to you no hard thoughts:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: The record of what injuries you did us,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Though written in our flesh, we shall remember
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: As things but done by chance.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Sole sir o' the world,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I cannot project mine own cause so well
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: To make it clear; but do confess I have
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Been laden with like frailties which before
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Have often shamed our sex.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Cleopatra, know,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: We will extenuate rather than enforce:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: If you apply yourself to our intents,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Which towards you are most gentle, you shall find
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: A benefit in this change; but if you seek
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: To lay on me a cruelty, by taking
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Antony's course, you shall bereave yourself
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Of my good purposes, and put your children
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: To that destruction which I'll guard them from,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: If thereon you rely. I'll take my leave.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: And may, through all the world: 'tis yours; and we,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Your scutcheons and your signs of conquest, shall
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Hang in what place you please. Here, my good lord.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: You shall advise me in all for Cleopatra.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: This is the brief of money, plate, and jewels,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I am possess'd of: 'tis exactly valued;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Not petty things admitted. Where's Seleucus?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Here, madam.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: This is my treasurer: let him speak, my lord,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Upon his peril, that I have reserved
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: To myself nothing. Speak the truth, Seleucus.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Madam,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I had rather seal my lips, than, to my peril,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Speak that which is not.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: What have I kept back?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Enough to purchase what you have made known.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Nay, blush not, Cleopatra; I approve
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Your wisdom in the deed.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: See, Caesar! O, behold,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: How pomp is follow'd! mine will now be yours;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: And, should we shift estates, yours would be mine.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: The ingratitude of this Seleucus does
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Even make me wild: O slave, of no more trust
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Than love that's hired! What, goest thou back? thou shalt
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Go back, I warrant thee; but I'll catch thine eyes,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Though they had wings: slave, soulless villain, dog!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: O rarely base!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Good queen, let us entreat you.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: O Caesar, what a wounding shame is this,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: That thou, vouchsafing here to visit me,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Doing the honour of thy lordliness
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: To one so meek, that mine own servant should
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Parcel the sum of my disgraces by
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Addition of his envy! Say, good Caesar,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: That I some lady trifles have reserved,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Immoment toys, things of such dignity
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: As we greet modern friends withal; and say,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Some nobler token I have kept apart
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: For Livia and Octavia, to induce
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Their mediation; must I be unfolded
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: With one that I have bred? The gods! it smites me
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Beneath the fall I have.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Prithee, go hence;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Or I shall show the cinders of my spirits
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Through the ashes of my chance: wert thou a man,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Thou wouldst have mercy on me.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Forbear, Seleucus.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Be it known, that we, the greatest, are misthought
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: For things that others do; and, when we fall,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: We answer others' merits in our name,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Are therefore to be pitied.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Cleopatra,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Not what you have reserved, nor what acknowledged,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Put we i' the roll of conquest: still be't yours,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Bestow it at your pleasure; and believe,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Caesar's no merchant, to make prize with you
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Of things that merchants sold. Therefore be cheer'd;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Make not your thoughts your prisons: no, dear queen;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: For we intend so to dispose you as
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Yourself shall give us counsel. Feed, and sleep:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Our care and pity is so much upon you,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: That we remain your friend; and so, adieu.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: My master, and my lord!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Not so. Adieu.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: He words me, girls, he words me, that I should not
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Be noble to myself: but, hark thee, Charmian.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Finish, good lady; the bright day is done,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: And we are for the dark.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Hie thee again:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I have spoke already, and it is provided;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Go put it to the haste.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Madam, I will.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Where is the queen?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Behold, sir.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Dolabella!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Madam, as thereto sworn by your command,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Which my love makes religion to obey,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I tell you this: Caesar through Syria
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Intends his journey; and within three days
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: You with your children will he send before:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Make your best use of this: I have perform'd
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Your pleasure and my promise.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Dolabella,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I shall remain your debtor.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I your servant,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Adieu, good queen; I must attend on Caesar.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Farewell, and thanks.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Now, Iras, what think'st thou?
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Thou, an Egyptian puppet, shalt be shown
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: In Rome, as well as I mechanic slaves
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: With greasy aprons, rules, and hammers, shall
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Uplift us to the view; in their thick breaths,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Rank of gross diet, shall be enclouded,
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: And forced to drink their vapour.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: The gods forbid!
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Nay, 'tis most certain, Iras: saucy lictors
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Will catch at us, like strumpets; and scald rhymers
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Ballad us out o' tune: the quick comedians
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Extemporally will stage us, and present
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Our Alexandrian revels; Antony
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Shall be brought drunken forth, and I shall see
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Some squeaking Cleopatra boy my greatness
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: I' the posture of a whore.

play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: There is a vent of blood and something blown:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: The like is on her arm.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: This is an aspic's trail: and these fig-leaves
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Have slime upon them, such as the aspic leaves
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Upon the caves of Nile.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Most probable
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: That so she died; for her physician tells me
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: She hath pursued conclusions infinite
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Of easy ways to die. Take up her bed;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: And bear her women from the monument:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: She shall be buried by her Antony:
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: No grave upon the earth shall clip in it
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: A pair so famous. High events as these
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Strike those that make them; and their story is
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: No less in pity than his glory which
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: Brought them to be lamented. Our army shall
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: In solemn show attend this funeral;
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: And then to Rome. Come, Dolabella, see
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.

line_text: High order in this great solemnity.
play_title_long: The Tragedy of Antony and Cleopatra
scene_title: SCENE II.  Alexandria. A room in the monument.
